contentrichtext.text: '''Normal, Alabama''' is the site of [[Alabama A&M|Alabama Agricultural and Mechanical University]]. AAMU is situated in the city limits and northern part of [[Huntsville, Alabama]], [[United States|USA]] in [[Madison County, Alabama|Madison County]]. Normal was established in 1890, when AAMU was then known as "State Normal and Industrial School of Huntsville". It was also designated a [[land grant college]] of [[Alabama]]. At that time student enrollment was 300 with 11 teachers. That same year, a [[United States]] [[Post Office]] was established there. Normal's [[ZIP Code]] is 35762. Students were called "Normalites". ==References== *[http://www.aamu.edu/PR/pr.htm AAMU Public Relations Office] {{coord|34|47|20|N|86|34|19|W|type:city_region:US-AL|display=title}} [[Category:Geography of Madison County, Alabama]] [[Category:Geography of Huntsville, Alabama]] [[Category:Populated places established in 1890]]
